ygData.subject: Re: Words of Quivering
ygData.msgSnippet: It s random on what creatures you get spell research components.  As for what word, I believe he said it was words of Quivering. Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard ...
ygData.messageBody:
It's random on what creatures you get spell research components. As for what word, I believe he said it was words of Quivering.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: James Lecouffe <puma@...>
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, May 08, 1999 10:46 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Words of Quivering


What kind of creture and where was this that you got this word of power and what word of power was it?
-----Original Message-----
From: Chris Trubiani <u1607755@...>
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, May 08, 1999 10:25 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Words of Quivering


It's a spell research component, offer it up to a magic user.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: Rob Wiltbank <chade@...>
To: eq_spell_research@onelist.com <eq_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, May 08, 1999 8:43 AM
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Words of Quivering


Hey there, folks..

Looking for some info.. I was fighting a creature and pulled off a scroll looking object called Words of Quivering -- all classes and races, no way to read or scribe it. The vendors would buy it for several plats, I think it may be a research component, any ideas?

Chade
Povar
